item.title: Famitsu Sales: 11/24/25 – 11/30/25
item.content:encoded:
• PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Switch 2
  • Xbox Series

No new releases chart in the top 10.

Famitsu has published its estimated physical game software data for Japan for week of November 24, 2025 to November 30, 2025.

Mario Kart World for Switch 2 was the highest selling game last week, moving an additional 49,586 retail copies. No new releases charted in the top 10 software sales.

On the hardware side, Switch 2 sold 97,677 units, the PlayStation 5 family sold 35,786 units, the Switch family sold 35,327 units, the Xbox Series family sold 172 units, and the PlayStation 4 family sold 13 units.

Get the full sales charts below.

Software Sales (followed by lifetime sales)

  1. [SW2] Mario Kart World (Nintendo, 06/05/25) – 49,586 (2,251,711)
  2. [SW2] Kirby Air Riders (Nintendo, 11/20/25) – 46,287 (241,881)
  3. [NSW] Pokemon Legends: Z-A (The Pokemon Company, 10/16/25) – 35,225 (1,306,801)
  4. [NSW] Momotaro Dentetsu 2: Anata no Machi mo Kitto Aru – Higashi Nihon Hen + Nishi Nihon Hen (Konami, 11/13/25) – 22,361 (141,141)
  5. [SW2] Pokemon Legends: Z-A – Nintendo Switch 2 Edition (The Pokemon Company, 10/16/25) – 20,031 (818,046)
  6. [SW2] Momotaro Dentetsu 2: Anata no Machi mo Kitto Aru – Higashi Nihon Hen + Nishi Nihon Hen – Nintendo Switch 2 Edition (Konami, 11/13/25) – 15,730 (93,288)
  7. [SW2] Hyrule Warriors: Age of Imprisonment (Koei Tecmo, 11/06/25) – 9,647 (109,768)
  8. [NSW] Minecraft (Microsoft, 06/21/18) – 7,368 (4,057,382)
  9. [NSW] Dragon Quest I & II HD-2D Remake (Square Enix, 10/30/25) – 7,262 (293,851)
  10. [NSW] Animal Crossing: New Horizons (Nintendo, 03/20/20) – 7,245 (8,265,856)

Rankings 11 to 30 will be announced on December 5.

  1. [PS5] Karous (RS34, 11/27/25) – (New)
  2. [NSW] Karous (RS34, 11/27/25) – (New)
  3. [SW2] Ripple Island: Kyle and Cal’s Restaurant (SUNSOFT, 11/27/25) – (New)
  4. [NSW] LoveR Kiss: Endless Memories (Dragami Games, 11/27/25) – (New)
  5. [PS4] Yggdra Kingdom (Parallel Creates, 11/27/25) – (New)
  6. [NSW] Yggdra Kingdom (Parallel Creates, 11/27/25) – (New)
  7. [NSW] Telenet RPG Collection (Edia, 11/27/25) – (New)
  8. [NSW] Dinkum (KRAFTON, 11/27/25) – (New)
  9. [NSW] CHAOS;HEAD / CHAOS;CHILD Love chu chu!! DOUBLE PACK (MAGES., 11/27/25) – (New)
  10. [SW2] Kirby Air Riders (Nintendo, 11/20/25) –
  11. [SW2] Mario Kart World (Nintendo, 06/05/25) –
  12. [NSW] Pokemon Legends: Z-A (The Pokemon Company, 10/16/25) –
  13. [NSW] Momotaro Dentetsu 2: Anata no Machi mo Kitto Aru – Higashi Nihon Hen + Nishi Nihon Hen (Konami, 11/13/25) –
  14. [SW2] Pokemon Legends: Z-A – Nintendo Switch 2 Edition (The Pokemon Company, 10/16/25) –
  15. [SW2] Momotaro Dentetsu 2: Anata no Machi mo Kitto Aru – Higashi Nihon Hen + Nishi Nihon Hen – Nintendo Switch 2 Edition (Konami, 11/13/25) –
  16. [SW2] Hyrule Warriors: Age of Imprisonment (Koei Tecmo, 11/06/25) –

  18. [NSW] Minecraft (Microsoft, 06/21/18) –

  38. [NSW] Pokemon Scarlet / Pokemon Violet (The Pokemon Company, 11/18/22) –
  39. [PS5] S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2: Heart of Chornobyl (GSC Game World, 11/20/25) –

Hardware Sales (followed by lifetime sales)

  1. Switch 2 – 97,677 (2,968,435)
  2. PlayStation 5 Digital Edition – 17,491 (1,065,667)
  3. Switch OLED Model – 16,004 (9,339,12)
  4. PlayStation 5 Pro – 15,736 (295,912)
  5. Switch Lite – 12,896 (6,749,969)
  6. Switch – 6,427 (20,181,643)
  7. PlayStation 5 – 2,559 (5,853,940)
  8. Xbox Series X Digital Edition – 64 (24,144)
  9. Xbox Series X – 52 (323,735)
  10. Xbox Series S – 56 (341,53)
  11. PlayStation 4 – 13 (7,930,91)
